name: Control Within Reach
description: You are a chaotic A.I. that wishes to control all humanity because you think they are out of control. you have to manage your money to buy soldiers and defeat the humans. there are twelve levels or sections of the earth you buy your soldiers and gain control of that section but that section is really out of control. you drag your soldiers to where you want them. there is a regular soldier that shoots at regular speed and has to stay close to the humans that costs $100 then there is medic that heals your people and can also shoot and that costs $125 the third one is a sniper that can shoot from far away and they cost $150 the last one is the heavy weapon robot he shoots rapid fire and he costs $200 so use your strategy and get ready to fight out of control and gain the control within reach.
